item.title: Simple Early Bird Injection
item.description: overview Introduction overview of APCqueue injection write injection code in c++ Extra Introduction A couple of months ago, I got curious about how malware works and evades anti-virus detection. Just pick up injection technics, there’re many kinds of ways that fascinate me a lot. So I decided to write about one of the process injection technics. In this blog, I‘ll mention “Early Bird APC Queue Code Injection”. Now let’s get started!
